summary: Adds a series of books by MikeRyan to the world of Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to sit down and read a good book in Skyrim? Well now you can this mod adds all of MikeRyan\'s stories in book form to Windhelm\'s Candlehearth Hall:

See pics for locations.

ATTENTION
******************************************

I did not write these stories that is the work of MikeRyan, he has given me permission to implement them into the game. You can read his stories at the following
links:

http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/650567-new-acquaintances/

http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/386765-on-stranger-tracks/

http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/536226-letter-from-home/

http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/396133-training-day/

http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/387047-we-all-need-a-friend/


******************************************

Installation:

Just put the .esp in your data folder. Done! (and of course activate in data files or nexus mod manager)
author: Jedijas
